page.shortlink: api objects table object create end function
page.description: The TABLE.CREATE_END() method completes the definition of a table structure that was initiated by the TABLE.CREATE_BEGIN() method, creates the table file, and returns a pointer. After the table file is created, it is opened and ready for use.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: Table file path and name. The .DBF file extension is automatically added to the filename if no other extension is specified.

argument.name: file_open_mode
argument.description: Optional. Determines the access privileges that apply to the new table file. It uses the following system variables:

section.title: Example
section.example: dim tbl as P table.create_begin("firstname","c",30) table.field_add("lastname","c",30) table.field_add("price","n",5,2) table.field_add("quantity","n",2) table.field_add("birthday","d") 'The create_end method creates the table and assign an object pointer to the table tbl = table.create_end("C:\sample.dbf")
